trans-unit.source: A trigger action that changes the speed of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação de gatilho que altera a velocidade de um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a SetStoryboardSpeedRatio action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively control a storyboard's speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Usar uma ação de SetStoryboardSpeedRatio com um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>ou um <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>para controlar a taxa de velocidade do storyboard interativamente.</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> property of SetStoryboardSpeedRatio to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>SetStoryboardSpeedRatio para especificar uma nova propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>a velocidade da animação como uma razão da velocidade da animação antigo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>como 2, a velocidade de duas vezes o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>animações e se você definir um valor de 0,5, reduzir a velocidade de 50 por cento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object affects the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> at anytime after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> begins.
trans-unit.target: Esse objeto afeta o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>na qualquer momento após o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>começa.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you pause the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> and use the SetStoryboardSpeedRatio, when you resume the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, it uses the new speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você parar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>e usar SetStoryboardSpeedRatio, quando você retomar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, ele usa o novo índice de velocidade.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>, which controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>deve fazer referência a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pausar, retomar, parar ou caso contrário, o controle um Storyboard interativamente a poderá pausar, retomar ou controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interativamente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>propriedade do seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>e usar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) controlá-lo fazendo referência a seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>não for especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>não pode ser controlado interativamente depois que ele é iniciado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: usar gatilhos de eventos para controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> a velocidade da animação como uma razão da velocidade da animação antigo.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para especificar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>a velocidade da animação como uma razão da velocidade da animação antigo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the SpeedRatio to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você definir o SpeedRatio como 2, dobrar a velocidade do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>animações e se você definir um valor de 0,5, reduzir a velocidade de 50 por cento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>
A taxa de velocidade para o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.
